headline.main: DEATH PENALTY FIXED IN VICHY'S COLONIES; American Possessions Included in Ban on Opposition

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 4 (AP) -- The Vichy Government today extended summary trials and the death penalty for "communistic and anarchistic activity" to its American colonies and the rest of its empire in sweeping measures against oppositionists.
abstract: Govt extends summary trials and death penalty for communist activity to empire
snippet: VICHY, France, Nov. 4 (AP) -- The Vichy Government today extended summary trials and the death penalty for "communistic and anarchistic activity" to its American colonies and the rest of its empire in sweeping measures against oppositionists....
